resources.string: By activating this service, you are allowing this Lock Screen App to perform screen locks operation every time you tap on Lock Screen App.
Allowing this App to perform screen locks operation.
To use lock screen service:\101. Select Lock Screen > Toggle Use service to ON. \102. Exit Accessibility Settings screen and tap Lock Screen App to lock.
You need to enable accessibility service for Lock Screen App to perform screen locks operation.
A convenient way to lock your phone\'s screen in one tap.
You need to grant this App with Device Administration to allow this App to perform screen lock operation.
Lock Screen App has been granted with Device Administration.\10Now you can tap Lock Screen App to lock your phone\'s screen.
To uninstall Lock Screen App:\101. Go to phone\'s Settings > Security > Device administrators > Uncheck Lock Screen.\102. Go to phone\'s Settings > Apps > Lock Screen > Tap Uninstall.
This is an app widget description
